section.heading: Certificate or pocket card lost or destroyed

content.p:
ยง 76. Certificate or pocket card lost or destroyed. If it shall be
established to the satisfaction of the secretary of state, in accordance
with rules and regulations of such department, that an unexpired license
certificate or pocket card, issued in accordance with the provisions of
this article, has been lost or destroyed without fault on the part of
the holder, such department shall issue a duplicate license certificate
or pocket card for the unexpired portion of the term of the original
license certificate. The secretary of state shall receive a
non-refundable fee of ten dollars for issuing a duplicate certificate of
license or identification card.
